animation performance using 3D transforms in order to leverage GPU and high sprite counts.

work.summary: Software developer for educational software aimed at Individuals looking to advance and/or retool themselves in today job market. I designed, refactored and updated our existing Customer Portal software used to enroll, capture payment, and manage student accounts during the course of their enrollment.
highlights: Aided in the development of the ESC REST application for data retrieval from a MongoDB instance.
Technologies used were PHP and javascript with jQuery.

work.summary: Designed, refactored and updated existing Customer Support software used to manage user accounts and in game functionality. Project was designed using Backbone and jQuery and relied heavily on REST API calls for data manipulation provided by back end engineers.
highlights: Maintained and updated content, both html and Javascript, for front facing game sites.
Provided research and solution to upcoming Marketplace redesign, including technologies to use, modular design, and environment setup while maintaining current php marketplaces

volunteer.summary: An hour of code for every student.
